pkgmetadata.longdescription: .. image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/django-otp-yubikey?color=blue :target: https://pypi.org/project/django-otp-yubikey/ :alt: PyPI.. image:: https://img.shields.io/readthedocs/django-otp-yubikey :target: https://django-otp-yubikey.readthedocs.io/ :alt: Documentation.. image:: https://img.shields.io/badge/github-django--agent--trust-green :target: https://github.com/django-otp/django-otp-yubikey :alt: SourceThis is a django-otp plugin that handles `YubiKey<https://www.yubico.com/yubikey>`_ devices using the Yubico OTP algorithm. Thisincludes two device definitions: one to verify YubiKey tokens locally andanother to verify them against a `web service<https://www.yubico.com/yubicloud>`_.See `django-otp <https://pypi.org/project/django-otp>`_ for more information onthe OTP framework... _upgrade notes: https://django-otp-yubikey.readthedocs.io/#upgrading
